page.title: 09TRIMDON VILLAGE CARNIVAL.
page.content: MANY VILLAGES AND TOWNS IN ENGLAND ORGANISE SUMMER{CARNIVALS}EACH YEAR. {TRIMDON,}ONE OF THE VILLAGES IN OUR BLOCK,HOLDS ONE OF THESE EVENTS IN JUNE.THE CARNIVAL BEGINS AT 12.30pm WITH A PROCESSION OF FLOATS.THIS MOVES AROUND THE STREETS IN THE VILLAGE AND FINISHES AT THE{COMMUNITY CENTRE {SPORTS FIELDS}WHERE THE REST OF THE CARNIVAL TAKES PLACE.ON THE FIELD THERE ARE{STALLS}WITH TOYS,FOOD,DRINK AND RAFFLES TO ATTRACT PEOPLE. THERE ARE SNACK BARS AND ICE-CREAM VANS.DURING THE DAY ,COMPETIONS ARE HELD.THESE INCLUDE B.M.X.,RUNNING RACES,WATER FIGHTS,AN INTELLIGENCE TEST AND A KNOBBLY KNEES{COMPETITION. THERE IS USUALLY A SMALL FAIRGROUND WITH STALLS,RIDES AND BOUNCY CASTLE. THERE IS PLENTY TO DO AND SEE TO KEEP EVERYONE ENTERTAINED FOR THE WHOLE DAY.
